remarks: Commutative/associative subtraction law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ablsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ablsub4 $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( Z e. B /\ W e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .- ( Z .+ W ) ) = ( ( X .- Z ) .+ ( Y .- W ) ) ) $.
